K. Louise Medeiros is a statistican and aspiring data scientist. They're currently employed in healthcare quality improvment at the [**American College of Surgeons**](https://www.facs.org/quality-programs/acs-nsqip/about), working extensively on [**MBSAQIP**](https://www.facs.org/quality-programs/mbsaqip) intiatives, including study design and analysis for a nationwide enhanced recovery study, along with a new quality program pilot.

Louise has a MS in Biostatistics from the School of Public Health at [**Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center**](http://sph.lsuhsc.edu/). <br>

For more information about organizations and projects Louise is active in, see the Organizations tab.
